question: What is this site?
answer: This site was created to visualize New Zealand Commuter data obtained in the 2018 census by NZ Statistics.

question: Who created this site?
answer: Jun Kagaya built this site as an entry to the There & Back Again Data Visualization Competition

question: Who can I contact for more information?
answer:
You can contact NZ Stats info@stats.govt.nz

Or email to me directly jun.a.kagaya@gmail.com
